title: Vietnamese Market
caption: This was my imagination of how a Vietnamese market would look like.
Inspired by old colonial buildings in Maputo. Perhaps thru my painting, one would be convinced to restore and not to demolish.

title: Villa Algarve
caption: One of the typical Old Portuguese houses with blue and white tiles.

title: We Never Stop Dancing
details: 73x91 cm, Rice Paper, Point Heating, Bamboo leaves, Silver Paper, Natural Pigment, Oil on Canvas
caption: It all started with the sway of bamboo leaves and rice paper. That's why we never stop dancing.

title: Utopia

caption: A place I've never seen, and if there was such, it would have been crowded by now.

title: Yaru Nu Artes Ivatan
caption: Established the Cooperative and Gallery Center for the artists in Batanes. Recycled wood painted by a group of local artists, joined together by gathering recycled materials and formed as the front of their Gallery. Each painting in the wood has their own creative identity...

title: There's no place like Batanes
details: 27cm x 47cm - Cans, paper, rubber, textile,tiles , Natural Pigment , Oil on Canvas
